meanings.definition: Organisms that float on the surface of water.
meanings.sent1: The pleuston drifted peacefully on the calm lake.
meanings.sent2: The biologist studied the pleuston to understand their habitat.
meanings.sent3: The pleuston had a party on the water, celebrating their unique lifestyle.
meanings.sent4: The colorful pleuston painted a vibrant picture on the still pond.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the diverse pleuston as they floated by.

meanings.definition: The community of organisms that float on the surface of water.
meanings.sent1: A variety of pleuston formed a bustling community on the pond.
meanings.sent2: Scientists observed the interactions within the pleuston community.
meanings.sent3: The pleuston community organized a talent show on the water.
meanings.sent4: The unity of the pleuston community resembled a floating village.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful sounds of the pleuston community created a serene atmosphere.
